clinical_history: Patient with unexplained weight loss and fever.
findings: No abnormal FDG uptake in the remaining organs.
Focal increased uptake in axillary lymph nodes, recommend further correlation with CT morphology.
No evidence of new metastatic lesions compared to prior scan.
Physiologic uptake observed in brain, myocardium, and urinary tract.
Hypermetabolic lymph nodes noted in axillary lymph nodes, suggestive of malignancy.
recommendations: Repeat PET-CT in 3–6 months to monitor treatment response.
